name: subtitled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a film or television picture) having words shown at the bottom to explain what is being said: a subtitled movie/programme
having a second part to its title: The Ninth Symphony is subtitled "Le fosse ardeatine". See
subtitle
More examplesFewer examplesThey went to watch an arty subtitled Mexican film.All of the films are subtitled in English.English-spoken movies are subtitled instead of dubbed in the Netherlands.The show is subtitled "A Democracy of Photography."His book is subtitled "The Rise and Fall of the American Empire".
